html:
Black Friday and Cyber Monday are just around the corner, and it’s high time to gear up for the best deals of this year! ugee offers whopping discounts of up to 40% off on our linkups including the latest comers Fun Drawing Pad UT2&UT3. Whether you find yourself as an artist, designer or just looking to explore your creative side, there’s no better chance to upgrade your toolkit with ugee’s fun gear.

Full disclosure: This sponsored article is brought to you by ugee.

Fun Drawing Pad UT2&UT3丨Make Fun Touchable and Believable

Up to this date, you’re free from tangled cables and cumbersome devices, the standalone tablet allows you to swiftly embark on your artistic journey. UT2 features a 10.36-inch 2K display, superb for holding in hand and following your wrist movements. While UT3 showcases a stunning 14.25-inch canvas, offering a 3:2 ratio visual enjoyment supported by 2400*1600 resolution.

There are some features that cannot be belittled beneath the surface. The NanoMatte Finish employed by both tablets takes you on an immersive journey akin to that of a paper. Certificated by TÜV Rheinland, UT3 builds further on enhancing your comfort with its low blue light and anti-glare, ensuring a worry-free experience no matter where you find yourself.

The parameters of UT3 do not fade next to tablets in its range. It inlays a 6nm 8-core CPU with dual microphones and four speakers around, so besides smooth drawing, various activities like reading, gaming, binge-watching, noting, or documenting are all self-evident. What’s more, 8GB RAM and 256GB ROM escort your breezy multitasking without any lag, and storage limitations become a thing of the past.

Global Shop丨10% OFF with the exclusive code ugeeBF2024
Amazon US丨Get Fun Drawing Pad UT3 with up to 20% OFF

UE16 Drawing Monitor丨Embrace the Essence of Colors Enriched

A comprehensive tool can truly come off in both quality and efficiency of photo editing. The ugee’s latest 15.4-inch UE16 Drawing Monitor emerges as an option that falls somewhere between being feature-packed and cost-effective, weighing only 1.28kg(2.8 pounds).

The UE16 features a 15.4-inch full HD monitor that combines an ultra-high color gamut of up to 143% sRGB, delivering a true-to-vision palette containing 16.7 million colors with its 8-bit color depth. The UE16 also allows you to seamlessly switch between sRGB, Adobe RGB, DCI-P3, and Black & White mode, meeting various visual preferences.

Global Shop丨Limited-time offer for $179 USD only
Amazon US丨Get UE16 Drawing Monitor slashing 20% OFF

UE12/UE12 PLUS Drawing Monitor

At the heart of the UE12/UE12 Plus resides an awe-inspiring display that exceeds all preconceived notions. With its capacity for up to 124%(UE12)/147%(UE12 Plus) sRGB color gamut, it presents a visual extravaganza that breathes life into images with unparalleled vibrancy and authenticity.

Equipped with the 11.6/11.9-inch FHD(1920*1080) full-laminated, anti-glare screen, the display boasts an enchanting level of intricacy and clarity, guaranteeing that every stroke, every shade, and every detail springs to life with striking precision. Whether artists are sketching intricate lines, blending vibrant colors, or perfecting minute details, the UE12/UE12 Plus serves as a seamless extension of their imagination, faithfully translating their visionary concepts into digital reality with zero parallax.

Global Shop丨$149 USD only for UE12 PLUS
Amazon US丨Black Friday Deal with 20% OFF

M808/M908 Drawing Tablet丨Art on a Whole New Level

The new ugee M808&908 is not stuck in a rut any longer that renders vibrant color options of orange, gray, and white with minimalist design, which manifests the personality of creators while releasing their productivity. The mainstream 10×6.25-inch display offers an immersive canvas for digital creations and showcases every detail and color with impressive clarity.

But it’s not just about appearances – ugee has also fine-tuned the technology under the hood. The tablets boast a new-gen EMR drawing stylus, with up to 16K levels of pressure sensitivity and a tilt function of 60°, providing an incredibly responsive and accurate stylus performance.

Global Shop丨25% discount for M808 and 20% for M908
Amazon US丨Black Friday Deal with 20% OFF

Q6 Mobile Drawing Tablet丨Unleash Your Imagination Anytime, Anywhere

Measuring a sleek 166×218 mm and weighing a mere 249 g, it is comparable in size and weight to an A5 notebook. The ugee Q6 boasts a detachable built-in Type-C cable that you can easily detach or stow, eliminating the need for additional cables or adapters. Just pick up the tablet and start drawing and creating anytime, anywhere.

The ugee Q6 Mobile Drawing Tablet boasts a trendy and fashionable appearance and is available in three different colors (Beige, Mint Green, and Charcoal Grey). It can be both elegant and charming, with outstanding aesthetics. The spaceship-shaped toggle switch adds a touch of sophistication and elevates the overall style. Take this stylish and eye-catching ugee Q6 with you, and turn heads wherever you go.

Global Shop丨$29 USD to snap this plug-and-play gadget
Amazon US丨Black Friday Deal with 20% OFF

Q8W Bluetooth Drawing Tablet丨Stylish. While Strengthful

The Q8W has an impressive performance, and its stunning white and orange scheme with a rounded shell will turn heads. The rounded edge design of the drawing tablet fits comfortably in the hand, offering better ergonomics by contouring to the shape of the hand grasp.

The Q8W Bluetooth drawing tablet is the ultimate tool for digital art beginners, designed to provide a stable and seamless drawing experience. With advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology and a 32-bit ARM architecture high-performance Bluetooth chip, the tablet offers a robust and reliable connection up to 10 meters from the device. This ensures that artists can move freely around their workspace without worrying about delays, lags, or disconnections.

Global Shop丨$39 USD to snap this adorable gadget
Amazon US丨Black Friday Deal with 20% OFF
